title: The vertices and edges of a graph represented as ordered pair

blocks.name: opvtxval
blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: opvtxfv
blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges as function value. (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: opvtxov
blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges as operation value. (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: opiedgval
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges. (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: opiedgfv
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges as function value. (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: opiedgov
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges as operation value. (Contributed by AV, 21-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: opvtxfvi
blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges as function value. (Contributed by AV, 4-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: opiedgfvi
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of a graph represented as an ordered pair of vertices and indexed edges as function value. (Contributed by AV, 4-Mar-2021.)
